title: Chests Available but no chest received on new champs when S is earned
body: I am having a problem with not receiving a chest when one of my team members or I earn an S or above. Since the addition of sorting the champs that still have their chest available, I know for certain that I did not have a chest earned on either champ I played when someone earned an S. I thought perhaps it was because I was in a solo queue, but I would think that wouldn't be the case since people earn chests in solo queue all the time. Am I incorrect in thinking this? Also, I have 4 chests available to earn currently, so it isn't as if I have reached the limit of chests either.

replies.body: People *can* earn chests in solo q, but only if they get an S on someone they own. The only way to [**get chests from someone else's S**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) is to be in a premade with them.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=REk5WUau,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-01T22:24:37.022+0000)
>
> People *can* earn chests in solo q, but only if they get an S on someone they own. The only way to [**get chests from someone else's S**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233) is to be in a premade with them.

I never actually knew that little tidbit, so thank you very much for the clarification.
